articles.title: Key leaders behind Google’s viral NotebookLM are leaving to create their own startup - TechCrunch
articles.description: Core members of Google's NotebookLM team are exiting to launch a startup, sharing some details exclusively with TechCrunch.
articles.content:
Three members of Googles NotebookLM team, including its team lead and designer, have announced they are leaving Google for a new stealth startup. 
On LinkedIn, ex-team lead Raiza Martin said she and… [+1305 chars]

articles.title: Gelsinger out as CEO – Intel turmoil continues - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Gelsinger first joined Intel in 1979 and went on to technical positions such as the lead for the 80486 processor, and eventually CTO.
articles.content:
In a shocking move, Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger has resigned his position as CEO as well as his seat on Intels board.
The resignation is effective as of December 1, 2024. Intel is currently looking for … [+3235 chars]
